title: Bobby Makes Statement On Morgan Wallen + Non-Traditional First Dance Wedding Songs + Lunchbox Calls 911...AGAIN
itunes:title: Bobby Makes Statement On Morgan Wallen + Non-Traditional First Dance Wedding Songs + Lunchbox Calls 911...AGAIN
description:
Bobby addresses the Morgan Wallen incident in which a video showed him using a racial slur. In Bobby’s Mailbag, a listener wanted advice on song choices for non-traditional first dance songs. We offer her some interesting suggestions! Plus, Lunchbox does one of his favorite things to do lately...he called 911. As it turns out, he was scolded by the operator for calling an emergency line with a non-emergency situation!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
